question: What is the functional pathway of gene FAM220A from protein to biological process?
cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {id: "FAM220A"})-[:TRANSLATED_INTO]->(p:Protein)
            MATCH (p)-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]->(bp:Biological_process)
            RETURN p.name AS protein, collect(DISTINCT bp.name)[0..3] AS processes

question: What biological processes involve the protein encoded by gene CLOCK?
cypher:
MATCH (g:Gene {id: "CLOCK"})-[:TRANSLATED_INTO]->(p:Protein)
            MATCH (p)-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]->(bp:Biological_process)
            RETURN collect(DISTINCT bp.name)[0..5] AS processes
